game_description: Two Great Powers racing toward mutual destruction while hoping the other will swerve first to avoid looking weak

players.name: Austria-Hungary
revealed_preference: Willing to risk war for honor

matrix.T_temptation: Opponent backs down, you gain prestige

contradiction_evidence: Claims justice motive but admits 'cannot look weak'
Frames as moral duty but reveals status anxiety

risk.sensitivity: Any miscalculation triggers alliance system cascade

prescription.player_b_advice: Offer face-saving compromise that allows Austria to claim victory
prescription.mediator_advice: Emergency mediation to create honor-preserving alternatives before 48 hours expire
prescription.victim_warning: Civilian populations of Europe face imminent catastrophe from Great Power honor competition
